name: Rico Shae in Cat Ball Fling!
name_original: Rico Shae in Cat Ball Fling!
description:
Help Rico get through Pachinkoland with the help of their trusty Patented-Catented Grapple Gun!

When Rico falls through the bottom of their Pachinko machine, you'll need to help our trusty feline friend grab onto the fruits and turtles (upgraded turtles that is), using only your left mouse button! Hold down the mouse to stay connected for longer, and use the momentum from that swing to try to direct Rico to where you want to go! Good luck, it'll be a bit of a fight against gravity and chaos to get this cat moving in the right direction. Try your best, and remember to aim for the score multipliers at the end.

Chase a highscore!

A Game by

Will Warren, Garrett Hobson and Matt Parker.
